titleStmt.title: To the learned and worthy artist Mr. Grinsted [sic] Gibbons.
titleStmt.author: Philipps, Samuel.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for James Norris, at the signe of the Kings-Arms without Temple-bar.,

notesStmt.note: The artist's name is Grinling Gibbons.
